channel.title: Samurai Sword
channel.description:
Ok... So this is one of the first Models I made... This IS NOT a leach, though there may be some like it, I Made this from [b][u]scratch[/u][/b]
[NOTE THIS DOES NOT WORK WITH A CLIENT, I TRIED LOOOOADDDSSS OF TIMES]
From above: [url=http://img526.imageshack.us/i/sm1.png/]http://img526.imageshack.us/i/sm1.png/[/url]
Without lines: [url=http://img44.imageshack.us/i/sm2v.png/]http://img44.imageshack.us/i/sm2v.png/[/url]
Hold model: [url=http://img16.imageshack.us/i/sm3.png/]http://img16.imageshack.us/i/sm3.png/[/url]
Wire Frame: [url=http://img404.imageshack.us/i/sm4.png/]http://img404.imageshack.us/i/sm4.png/[/url]
So, what do you think?
Any comments are greatly appreciated.
And sorry about the links rather than images, it doesn't support the formats.
[url=http://uppit.com/v/QSBYTV7N]Hold Model[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/v/GYG7TO44]Drop Model[/url]

item.title: Samurai Sword
item.dc:creator: @Mumi_jnr Mumi_jnr
item.description:
@Mumi_jnr wrote:

Thanks for the ints.
I think I’ll just leave this one outta the client…
It looks alright but it’s being a pain in the arse to add. -.-[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 03, 2009, 02:57:05 pm[/size][hr]And the faces are fine.
There are waaaaaaaaaay less than 1500.

Read full topic

item.title: Samurai Sword
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

something is wrong with the model, it won’t work on the server, but here are the ints.

if(i == 15226) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 14206; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 14207; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 14207; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Samurai Sword"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "The sword of the Samurai.".getBytes(); // Item Examine }

edit1: I know what I did wrong, hold up let me check if the sword works on the client.
edit2: LOL, it makes you invisible I think it has too many faces or soemthing?

Read full topic
